post.title: nvidia geforce 180.48 whql drivers
post.content: new whql certified drivers. they only support a limited set of products for now, please check the products supported list before you download and install. http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp_180.48_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winxp64_180.48_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...0.48_whql.html http://www.nvidia.com/object/winvist...0.48_whql.html
